svg.text: GitHub Actions CI/CD Workflow with Azure Federation
Automated deployment pipeline using OIDC federation (no secrets required)

g.text: Workflow: Deploy to Azure Web App
âœ“ No secrets stored in GitHub - Token exchanged at runtime
If OIDC not available, use publish profile from Azure Portal:
âš ï¸ Contains credentials - store in GitHub Secrets
Only deploys when webapp files change
Each environment has its own secrets
â€¢ No long-lived secrets in GitHub
â€¢ Short-lived tokens (valid for workflow run only)
â€¢ Audit trail in Azure AD
